title: IncidentVBO-Initiator
description: The individual who has raised the incident on behalf of the requester.

ids.description: The set of Identifiers for the VBO or component. These should be used to uniquely identifier instances of the business object or component.

items.description: The identifier of the business object or component. This should be used to identify instances of a business object or component. Where the component is being used to reference another business object then this is the primary key of the target object. Use the attributes @schemeName and @schemeAgencyName to identify type of Identifier.

@scheme-name.description: The name of the identification scheme. The schemeName of the ID

@scheme-agency-name.description: The name of the agency that maintains the identification scheme. The schemeAgencyName of the ID

name.description: The name of the instance of a business object or component.

desc.description: A free text description of a business object or component.

type.description: A classification of the business object or component. This identifies the sub-type of the instance of object or component.

@list-agency-name.description: The name of the agency that maintains the list of codes. The listAgencyName of the Type

@list-name.description: The name of a list of codes. The listName of the Type

categories.description: The set of classifications for the business object or component.

items.description: A classification applied to the business object or component. More than one classification scheme can be applied using the @listName attribute to identify the type of code list being used. The classification scheme can be used to group instances of the object or component.

@list-agency-name.description: The name of the agency that maintains the list of codes. The listAgencyName of the Category

@list-name.description: The name of a list of codes. The listName of the Category

status.description: The lifecycle state of the business object or component. This field is used to track the specific state an instance of an object or component is in.

@list-agency-name.description: The name of the agency that maintains the list of codes. The listAgencyName of the Status

@list-name.description: The name of a list of codes. The listName of the Status

death-indicator.description: Flag indicating whether the Individual has died

local-trading-name.description: The name of the organisation in its local area under which it trades. This may be its formal name or a colloquial version.

geo-location.description: The geographical location (latitude and longitude) of the organisation. The Geographical Location component should be used in preference to this field.

accounting-period.description: The period through which the organisation measures its financial performance; e.g. Apr-Mar. Also known as the Financial Year of the organisation.

ctps-registeration.description: Indicates whether the organisation has registered with the Corporate Telephone Preference Service

dissolution-date.description: If the organisation no longer trades; this is the date on which it was closed down. Must comply with the ISO8601 standard.

foundation-date.description: The date on which the organisation was founded; but not necessarily incorporated.

incorporation-date.description: The date on which the organisation was incorporated; i.e. registered with the local Companies House or similar.

number-of-family-members.description: The number of sub-organisations within this parent organisation. This may be interpreted as the number of departments in an organisation or the number of companies under an umbrella company.

organisation-status-code.description: The status of the organisation. The Organisation/Status must be used in preference to this field.

@list-agency-name.description: The name of the agency that maintains the list of codes. The listAgencyName of the Organisation Status Code

@list-name.description: The name of a list of codes. The listName of the Organisation Status Code

organisation-status-date.description: The start and end dates from which the status of the organisation applied.

from-date.description: The date from which the business object or component is effective.

to-date.description: The date to which the business object or component is effective.

sic-description.description: The description of the Standard Industry Classification code.

standard-industrial-classification.description: The Standard Industry Classification Code for the organisation.

industry.description: The industry in which the organisation has primary operation.

sub-industry.description: Part of segmentation process; used for marketing analysis.

tax-identification-number.description: Tax Identification Number (TIN). The registration number of the organisation with the federal/government tax office. In the U.K. this would be the HMRC.

website.description: A reference to the organisation's main website. This field must comply with RFC3986.

initiator-group.description: The support group the initiator belongs to.

full-address.description: The full email address e.g. peter.jackson@vodafone.com

email-verified.description: Indicates whether the email address is verified.

phone-type.description: The phone type e.g. Landline; mobile

local-area-code.description: The local area code for this telephone

full-number.description: The full number of this telephone

street.description: The street; expressed as text; of this address

town.description: The town name; expressed as text; of this address

building-name.description: The building name; expressed as text; of this address

building-number.description: The building number expressed as text; for this address. e.g. 38; 55a

county.description: Name of the county in which the city falls; where applicable

post-code.description: A code specifying the post code of the address

primary-classification.description: The primary classification of this address

sub-locality.description: The sub locality of this address e.g district or borough

sub-street.description: The sub street of this address

sub-unit.description: The sub unit of this address

building-letter.description: The building letter of this address

town-suffix.description: The town suffic of this address

country-code.description: The ISO 3166-2 country code of this address

street-suffix.description: A modifier to a street name often to denote a relative direction

street-type.description: The kind of thoroughfare. Example alley; avenue; boulevard; crescent etc

level-nr.description: The floor number within a building

level-type.description: A description of the level within a building where numbers are not used

private-street-name.description: The name of a street with a site. Example Street within a university

portal.description: The portal name of the apartment or flat

portal-door.description: The portal door number of the apartment or flat
